logical_fallacies.quote: i've found the idea of escape to be pointless because i have no idea what exists outside this, and i already got to the point where i can manifest so i might as well just ride this out and see how things go
logical_fallacies.correction: Personal experience is not a substitute for evidence. The inability to conceive of something does not make it impossible or pointless to consider. The ability to 'manifest' (if true) within a system doesn't negate the possibility or desirability of escaping it.
